actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security income benefits to individuals who are residents of certain public institutions.

summary.text: Eliminates, under title XVI (Supplemental Security Income Benefits) of the Social Security Act, the present prohibition against the payment of supplemental security income benefits to individuals who are residents of skilled nursing facilties, nursing homes, intermediate care facilities, or residential facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security income benefits to individuals who are residents of certain public institutions.
